scripts.upload-assets:
wrangler kv:key put "assets/index.html" ./index.html && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/styles.css" ./styles.css && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/utils.js" ./js/utils.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/storage.js" ./js/storage.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/time.js" ./js/time.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/context-menu.js" ./js/context-menu.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/apps.js" ./js/apps.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/wallpaper.js" ./js/wallpaper.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/search.js" ./js/search.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/settings.js" ./js/settings.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/events.js" ./js/events.js && \
                      wrangler kv:key put "assets/js/app.js" ./js/app.js
